solution_line_template: Mon, Wed, Fri she gets a ${creamsicle_price} orange creamsicle so that's {creamsicle_days} days * ${creamsicle_price}/day = $<<{creamsicle_days}*{creamsicle_price}={creamsicle_weekly}>>{creamsicle_weekly}
Tue and Thur she gets a ${sandwich_price} ice cream sandwich so that's {sandwich_days} days * ${sandwich_price}/day = $<<{sandwich_days}*{sandwich_price}={sandwich_weekly}>>{sandwich_weekly}

Sat and Sun she gets a ${nutty_buddy_price} nutty-buddy so that's {nutty_buddy_days} days * ${nutty_buddy_price}/day = $<<{nutty_buddy_days}*{nutty_buddy_price}={nutty_buddy_weekly}>>{nutty_buddy_weekly}
